about_the_game:
The Capsa - Vehicle Bimini Pack includes a selection of items to enable you to begin customizing your vehicles.

This pack of cosmetic items contains 6 vehicle kits.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Barracuda Bimini Kit
  • Barracuda T-Top Kit
  • Barrelback Sunning Kit
  • Pontoon Bimini Kit
  • Mako Bimini Kit
  • Moray Bimini Kit
detailed_description:
The Capsa - Vehicle Bimini Pack includes a selection of items to enable you to begin customizing your vehicles.

This pack of cosmetic items contains 6 vehicle kits.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Barracuda Bimini Kit
  • Barracuda T-Top Kit
  • Barrelback Sunning Kit
  • Pontoon Bimini Kit
  • Mako Bimini Kit
  • Moray Bimini Kit
name: Capsa - Vehicle Bimini Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Onboard graphics chipsets and discrete GPU's not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A SSD or better hard drive is recommended

short_description: The Capsa - Vehicle Bimini Pack includes a selection of items to enable you to begin customizing your vehicles.
